Welcome to Skeleventy!

A ‚ò†Ô∏è Skeleton boilerplate built with Eleventy and Tailwind CSS.

Features

  • Tailwind CSS for beautiful and fast UI styling
  • Gulp to watch and compile your Tailwind, SCSS & JS files
  • Purgecss to remove any unused CSS
  • HTML minifier
  • A simple, elegant blog, with featured post images

Design and code (except graphics) are open source on GitHub. See the pull request for the current design, or read the credits.
